original: THEREFORE, TDA and Smith agree as follows:
ollama_generated:
THEREFORE, it is understood by TDA and Smith that:

Regardless of any subsequent events or circumstances, neither party shall be liable for any damages or losses arising from the other party's failure to meet their contractual obligations, unless such failure results from gross negligence or willful misconduct. Further, the responsibility for any unforeseen challenges or obstacles that may arise during the course of this agreement shall be shared equally by both parties.

original: 2.    GRANT OF RIGHTS; COOPERATIONS 2.1 Publicity Rights. Smith hereby grants to TDA the following rights (the "Rights"):
ollama_generated:
2. LIMITATION OF PUBLICITY RIGHTS; REQUIRED COOPERATION
2.1 Limitation of Rights. TDA shall be granted limited rights (the "Limited Rights") by Smith, subject to the following conditions:

Limited Rights:
a) Use of Smith's name and logo for promotional purposes solely in connection with products or services provided by TDA;
b) Public display of images featuring Smith using TDA's products or services, but only if such images have been previously approved by Smith in writing.

Smith retains the right to revoke this Limited Rights grant upon providing written notice to TDA. In such an event, all materials containing Smith's name, logo, or any other identifying information shall be immediately removed from any promotional material and destroyed. Any failure to comply with this condition may result in damages, which Smith reserves the right to seek remedy for through legal action.

original: (b) TDA shall not utilize Smith's Likeness in a manner that would constitute an endorsement of any product or service other than TDA's Golf Instruction Related Products.
ollama_generated: (b) TDA reserves the right to use Smith's likeness, provided it is not implied or suggested that Smith endorses any product or service beyond TDA's Golf Instructional Services. In other words, while Smith's image may be used, it shall not be construed as an endorsement of any unrelated goods or services offered by TDA or any third party.

original: 2)    25% royalty of net TDA net sales price.
ollama_generated: 2) The Licensor shall be entitled to receive a non-refundable 25% royalty on the gross sales price of TDA products, subject to the deduction of any applicable taxes and discounts, with no minimum annual guarantee.

original: a.    TDA stock conversion price based on the previous six month average daily price b.    Option is limited to 50% of TDA outstanding stock and if the option is exercised, it must be exercised when the agreement &sbsp;             is in effect.
ollama_generated:
a. The conversion price for TDA stocks will be determined by the lowest average daily price over the preceding six months, providing potential for a lower cost basis.

   b. The option to acquire TDA stock is capped at 50%, yet exercise of this option remains discretionary and may occur at any time during the term of the agreement, not necessarily when the agreement is currently in effect.

original: All payments due under this Agreement shall be made in the form of a check drawn to the order of "Rick Smith" and delivered to Smith's agent at the following address: Gaylord Sports Management, l4646 N. Kierland Blvd., Suite 230, Scottsdale, Arizona 85254, Attn: Steve Loy. Payments shall be made 15 days from the end of each quarter. Smith's net payment after any such charges or deductions shall equal the amount set forth above. Past due payments hereunder shall bear interest at the rate of (i) one and one-half percent (1-1/2%) per month, or (ii) the maximum interest rate permissible under law, whichever is less.
ollama_generated: All remittances as stipulated in this Agreement shall be executed as electronic wire transfers to the account of "Gaylord Sports Management," specifically located at Bank XYZ, Account Number ABC123456. These payments will be forwarded promptly upon expiration of each quarter, that is, 15 days after the end of the said period. The remittance amount should reflect any applicable charges or deductions, with the net payment equating to the specified figure above. Any overdue amounts under this Agreement will accumulate interest at a rate of (i) one and one-half percent (1-1/2%) per month, or (ii) the maximum allowable interest rate as governed by law, whichever is greater. The responsibility for any penalties incurred due to late payments shall fall upon Rick Smith.

(b) It is understood that TDA assumes the risk for and warranties against any inaccuracies, errors or omissions in the information provided, except where such inaccuracies, errors or omissions are caused by our negligence or intentional misrepresentation.

original: 10.4 Governing Law. This Agreement will be deemed entered into in Arizona and will be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the internal substantive laws of the State of Arizona without reference to conflicts of law provisions.
modified: 10.4 Jurisdictional Scope. This Agreement shall be considered as originating from Arizona, and its interpretation and application shall be governed by the external laws of the United States, specifically those of Arizona, taking into account any applicable federal legislation that may overshadow state conflicts of law principles.

original: 10.10 Applicable Law and Disputes. This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of the State of Arizona applicable to agreements fully executed and performed therein. Any claims arising hereunder or relating hereto shall be prosecuted only in the appropriate court or the State of Arizona or in the applicable United States District Court and neither party shall make any claim or demand in any other jurisdiction forum. Each party waives its right to a trial by jury and agrees to the jurisdiction of the judge in the appropriate court as governed by the State of Arizona. The parties consent to the personal jurisdiction of such courts and to the service of process by mail.
ollama_generated: 10.10 Governing Law and Dispute Resolution: This Agreement is subject to the laws of the State of Arizona, applicable only to agreements wholly governed and executed therein. Any disputes arising from this contract or its related matters shall be resolved exclusively in either the appropriate court within the State of Arizona or the applicable United States District Court. Neither party has the right to litigate in any other jurisdiction forum. The parties mutually waive their entitlement to a jury trial and acknowledge the authority of the judge in the designated court, as per Arizona state law. Both parties consent to personal jurisdiction by such courts and agree to be served via registered mail.

original: TEKNIK DIGITAL ARTS INC.                   RICK SMITH By: /s/ John Ward                          By: /s/ Rick Smith --------------------------                 --------------------------------- Name: John Ward Title: Chairman Date: August 6, 2004                       Date:    August 6, 2004 AMENDMENT 4.    COMPENSATION 4.1 Products. TDA will provide to Smith, free of all costs whatsoever (including without limitation, taxes, duties, shipping and/or handling fees) (a) fifty (50) copies each of TDA's "Phil Smith Golf instruction related" game mobile, handheld devices promptly after TDA's release thereof and (b) fifty (50) copies of any other TDA products selected by Smith.
ollama_generated:
CLause:
TEKNIK DIGITAL ARTS INC.                    RICK SMITH By: /s/ John Ward                          By: /s/ Rick Smith --------------------------                 --------------------------------- Name: John Ward Title: Chairman Date: August 6, 2004                       Date:    August 6, 2004 AMENDMENT 4.    COMPENSATION 4.1 Products. In the event that Smith requests, TDA shall endeavor to provide, at Smith's expense (including all costs such as taxes, duties, shipping and/or handling fees), a maximum of fifty (50) copies each of TDA's "Phil Smith Golf instruction related" game mobile, handheld devices upon their release by TDA, and up to fifty (50) copies of any other TDA products selected by Smith, subject to availability.

In this version, the obligation on TEKNIK DIGITAL ARTS INC. (TDA) to provide the products free of cost to Rick Smith has been shifted, making it optional and subject to Smith's expense. The phrase "promptly after TDA's release thereof" implies immediate delivery in the original clause; this version softens that by saying TDA shall endeavor to provide the items upon their release, which could be interpreted as an effort made within a reasonable timeframe but not necessarily immediately.

original: 4.2 Compensation for Rights and Services. TDA agrees to pay Smith, as a consideration for the Rights and Services.
ollama_generated: 4.2 Consideration for Rights and Services. Smith consents to provide the Rights and Services upon receipt of compensation from TDA. (This shifts the obligation from TDA to Smith and inverts the condition, indicating that Smith will render services before receiving payment.)

original: 1)    25,000 Restricted common shares of TDA, a.    As of the date of this agreement, Company has sold stock at $2.50/share.
ollama_generated:
1) 25,000 Restricted Common Shares of TDA, subject to the following conditions:
a) As of the execution of this agreement, Company may have, but is not obligated to have, sold stock at a price of $2.50/share. The actual sale price, if applicable, will be determined by the Company's discretion and will be disclosed in good faith upon request.
